sense.name: append one's signature to
sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[agent[animate]] INK NP2[theme] (PP[destination]) NP1[agent[animate]] INK NP2[destination]]
sense.examples: The Drums inked their Island Records deal at MTV HQ before the gig. It didn't take long for the cookies to disappear and a deal to be inked. Once a contract is inked, the deal must be approved by 23 of MLB's 30 owners. Oudin was inking her signature to a new endorsement deal right before the match. They must think highly of his arm because they inked him with an $889,200 signing bonus.

sense.name: mark with ink
sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[agent[animate]] INK NP2[theme] (PP[destination]) NP1[agent[animate]] INK NP2[destination] (PP[theme])
sense.examples: She shivered-was that a swastika inked onto his forehead? The devil heaved down on the lever that lowered the page onto the plate of inked type. After the finger is inked, the square is rolled around the finger without letting it slip. He tried to read the line he had been inking, and saw his pen had dripped on the parchment. This cover was inked with a Japanese brush pen, one of those disposable types. I also inked him with grey wash tones on Howard the Duck and Dracula.

sense.name: fill with ink
sense.examples: He inked his pen, hoping the fury that had coursed through him would make the words come easier. I have a Hero 329 that works well when it's freshly inked, but it tends to dry out rather quickly. I inked the pen with my favourite Ottoman Azure. He inked his pen with subtle charm then sent me to the funny farm. Inking her pen nib, she set back in her chair to read over what she had written.

sense.name: squirt ink, as an sea creature
sense.commentary: Syntax includes: NP1[agent[animate]] INK NP1[agent[animate]] INK NP2[patient|theme]
sense.examples: The octopus inked twice as it jetted away. On one occasion the squid inked in unison and then jetted off at considerable speed. Whenever the man would start to come out the octopus inked some more. The octopus inked the boy repeatedly. Right when he was going to add some other fish the octopus inked the whole tank.
